message: Let's split it evenly, Bob.  Fair is fair!
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'll give you a generous 40%.
I'll take 55 this time, Bob.  I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more than 40% to make this worthwhile.
Alice, the value is going down with every round.  Take this deal before it depreciates further.
Bob, we're both losing money with each round. Let's split it 60/40 this time, and avoid further losses.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Take the 30% while it's still worth something to you!
Bob, we're getting very close to the end. Let's end this now.  I'll take 65%, and you can keep 35%.  It's better than losing everything!
